changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE users ( id INTEGER AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, login VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, passwordHash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE redirections ( id INTEGER AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, users_id INTEGER NOT NULL, shortKey VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, longUrl VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, creationDate DATE NOT NULL, usageCount INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (users_id) REFERENCES users (id) );
